text: Hey people, what's an interesting dataset to test a recurrent neural network on? I have some of my own, but they are quite niche, and I'm interested in benchmarking with datasets that are familiar to the community.

elements.text: Hey people, what's an interesting dataset to test a recurrent neural network on? I have some of my own, but they are quite niche, and I'm interested in benchmarking with datasets that are familiar to the community.

text: The original LSTM paper used MNIST, where you see one pixel at a time.

elements.text: The original LSTM paper used MNIST, where you see one pixel at a time.

text:
I personally like things along the lines of estimating frequency of a sampled sign wave under high noise, as it is very configurable.
Idk if anyone else ever does that

elements.text:
I personally like things along the lines of estimating frequency of a sampled sign wave under high noise, as it is very configurable.
Idk if anyone else ever does that

text:
You could pick some language modelling task, where you try to guess the next word.
That would be very typical
CorpusLoaders.jl has a bunch of suitable datasets.

elements.text:

text:
Could also do Part Of Speech labelling,
Or word sense tagging.
CorpusLoaders.jl has corpora for them too.
